name: Games Club Game
description:
Controls

Keyboard: 
Hold the D key to move right
W to jump
Escape to go back to main menu

Touchscreen:
Tap and hold to move right
Double tap top right corner to go back to main menu

-

A Game Made By:

TINDERBOX ONLINE GAMES CLUB

Supported by Digi Schoolhouse

-

Tinderbox Game Tournament 

How fast can you complete the game?

Take a screenshot of your score and send to us by lab@tinderboxcollective.org

Or send to us on Facebook, Instagram or Twitter using the hashtag #TinderboxGameTournament
